242294.en:
How do you do, ? I am Antoinette, the queen of the blue roses. She's a bit of a wanderer, but
that's her charm. If you're lost, I'm here to help.
242294.ja:
ã€Œã”ãã’ã‚“ã‚ˆã†ã€€ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚ã“ããŒã€€é’ãƒãƒ©ã®å¥³ç‹ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãªã®ã ã‚ã€‚

242296.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! Have you finished the King's judgment? We were supposed to
make the judgement more exciting with our performance! Our Protection, The Oracle, is waiting for you in Goda
Temple! Go on!
242296.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆãããŸãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼ ã€€ã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã®åœ’ã ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼

242298.en:
Looks like you made it through the trial. Bravo! Bravo! Actually, I have a crush on Antoinette. Ah, this love
Orvoire.

242300.en:
Hey there ! I'm afraid I've frightened you. I've lent you this pretty bodice. I've lent you this
pretty bodice. I am the King of Jyadain Garden! PeachLeon! Once again, I ask for your kind regards! Fofo! We,
the Teeny Sanguini, were persecuted in the Demon World for being lazy and were about to perish when The Oracle
saved us. The Oracle is waiting for you at Goda Temple. Hurry up and get there. Foffo!
242300.ja:
ã€Œã‚„ã‚ã‚„ã‚ã€€ï¼ ã€€ãŠã©ã‚ã‹ã›ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‹ã®ã†ã€‚

242302.en: Teehee <heart> You've got the makings of a good one... <heart>

242304.en:
Pikey! We're the tough monsters! We were bullied in Demon World, so we ran for our lives to escape here. The
Oracle is an elder of Demon World who protects us in his own garden, Jyadain Garden. But he is a very busy man, so
the Sanguini King usually organizes this Jyadain Garden!
242304.ja:
ã€Œãƒ”ã‚­ãƒ¼ï¼ã€€ã‚ªã‚¤ãƒ©ãŸã¡ã€€ã‹ã‚ˆã‚ã„é­”ç‰©ã ã‚ˆï¼ ã€€é­”ç•Œã§ã€€ã„ã˜ã‚ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ ã€€å‘½ã‹ã‚‰ãŒã‚‰ã€€ã“ã“ã¸ã€€é€ƒã’è¾¼ã‚“ã ã‚“ã ã€‚

242306.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! The ceremony to choose the Great Demon King is about to
begin! Proceed to the Ceremonial Hall of Goda Temple!

242308.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! The Oracle awaits you! Proceed to the Source Shrine of Goda
Temple!
242308.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆãããŸãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼ ã€€ã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã®åœ’ã ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼
ã€Œé­”ä»™å¿ã•ã¾ãŒã€€ãŠå‰ã‚’ãŠå¾…ã¡ã ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼ ã€€ã‚´ãƒ€ç¥æ®¿ã®ã€€æ ¹æºã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã¸ã€€é€²ã‚€ãŒã„ã„ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼

244156.en:
How do you do, ? I am Antoinette, Queen of the Blue Roses. It seems that a mademoiselle named
Irusha has come to Goda Temple. Can I be her friend? She's willing to endure bloodsucking for that.If you don't
have blood, why don't you drink wine?
244156.ja:
ã€Œã”ãã’ã‚“ã‚ˆã†ã€€ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚ã“ããŒã€€é’ãƒãƒ©ã®å¥³ç‹ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãªã®ã ã‚ã€‚
ã€Œã‚´ãƒ€ç¥æ®¿ã«ã€€ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ã¨ã„ã† ã€€ãƒãƒ‰ãƒ¢ã‚¢ã‚¼ãƒ«ãŒã€€ã‚„ã£ã¦ããŸã‚ˆã†ãªã®ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚ã€€ãŠå‹é”ã«ãªã‚Œã‚‹ã‹ã—ã‚‰â€¦â€¦ï¼Ÿ
ã€Œãã®ãŸã‚ãªã‚‰ã°ã€€å¸è¡€ã‚‚ã€€ãŒã¾ã‚“ã™ã‚‹ã®ã ã‚ã€‚ ã€€è¡€ãŒãªã‘ã‚Œã°ã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚’é£²ã‚ã°ã„ã„ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ï¼

244157.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! The Oracle has decreed that I will be kind to all, no matter
how strange or weird you are! Fear not, be grateful! Mon, mon!

244158.en:
Demon World Bassball is an era of domination.Someday, we Kirabreads will become the best in the Demon World by
defeating the famous and powerful Ryuwos!

244159.en:
A strange woman named Irusha came. Sanguin is getting all cute with her. I'm prettier than her! You're weird
too! You look like a demon because you have some kind of magic trick on you when you are really a . You
can't fool my eyes. Hmmm!

244160.en:
I have a reputation for my aesthetic
sense! You look somewhat like The
Oracle! Fah!

244161.en:
I am so honored to be appointed as Irusha's caretaker! I'm so nervous! I want to be of help to ,
too. I'll do my best!

244163.en:
I may look like this, but I am a fairy. This flower-colored fur is so fantastic, isn't it? But if I had made
a mistake, I would have turned into an ugly demon. Well, I'm really glad!

244164.en:
There is a mysterious pot. If you look
closely, you can see small letters
engraved on it.

244165.en:
This pot will bring you back to the
time of trial.

244166.en: Would you like to dive into the POT?<yesno><close>

244189.en:
Hello there, of <%sev_personality>! I am the King of Jyadain Garden! PeachLeon! Fofo! We,
the Teeny Sanguini, were persecuted in the Demon World for being lazy and were about to perish when The Oracle
saved us.

248140.en:
How do you do, ? I am Antoinette, Queen of the Blue Roses. Irusha, the mademoiselle, is a very
quiet but warm-hearted girl. She won the hearts of all the monsters in the park in no time! I'm a total fan of
hers!
248140.ja:
ã€Œã”ãã’ã‚“ã‚ˆã†ã€€ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚ã¯ã€€é’ãƒãƒ©ã®å¥³ç‹ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãªã®ã ã‚ã€‚
ã€Œã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ã¨ã„ã†ã€€ãƒãƒ‰ãƒ¢ã‚¢ã‚¼ãƒ«â€¦â€¦ ã€€ã¨ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€€é™ã‹ãªã®ã ã‘ã© ã€€ã‚ãŸãŸã‹ã„æ„Ÿã˜ãŒã™ã‚‹ã€€ã„ã„ã‚³ãªã®ã€‚
ã€Œãã‚Œã§ã€€ã‚ã£ã¨ã„ã†é–“ã«ã€€ã“ã®åœ’ã® ã€€é­”ç‰©ãŸã¡ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ã€€ã†ã°ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã®ï¼ ã€€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚ã‚‚ã€€ã™ã£ã‹ã‚Šã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ãªã®ã ã‚ï¼

248141.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! The Oracle has been looking for you! Proceed to the
audience chamber of Goda Temple!

248142.en:
I actually have a crush on Antoinette.
What should I do about this
unfulfilled love of mine?

248143.en:
Sanguin is so smitten with this Irusha girl, but she doesn't seem to be a bad girl. But she doesn't seem to be a bad
girl, so I'm willing to admit it. I'm cuter than she is! You're weird, aren't you? You're really ,
but you look like a demon because you're under some weird spell. You can't fool my eyes. Hmmm..!

248144.en:
Hello ! I'm doing my best to take care of Irusha! I'm trying my best to be Irusha's caretaker, but I
feel so relaxed when I'm around her. I feel like I'm being taken care of more than you!

248145.en:
of <%sev_personality>! You have done well! I am PeachLeon, King of Jyadain Garden! You may now
relax after your journey in my Jyadain Garden! Foffo!

248146.en:
<heart> There are many adult secrets
hidden in the pot~<heart>.

248147.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! I heard you are going to seal the miasmound! Good luck with
that!

248148.en:
<pc>! I was perfectly
listening to you, The Oracle! I was
perfectly listening to The Oracle!<yesno><break>

248149.en:
I see! Well then, please take care!
I'll try my best to stay at home!

248150.en:
The Oracle asked you and Irusha to contain the demon miasma that is emanating from miasmounds in various
locations in Demon World! There are three places where miasmounds are located. The first is northwest of
Jyarimbaha Desert. The second is southwest of Gerhena Field. The third one is southwest of Belvain Forest, in
the territory of a great nobleman! It seems that you can go there from anywhere! I was told to return to The
Oracle's place after I successfully sealed the three seals! Good luck!
248150.ja:
ã€Œé­”ä»™å¿ã•ã¾ã®ã”ä¾é ¼ã¯ã€€é­”ç•Œã®ã„ã‚ã‚“ãªæ‰€ã«ã‚ã‚‹ ã€€é­”ç˜´å¡šã‹ã‚‰å™´ãã ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€€é­”ç˜´ã‚’ ã€€ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ã•ã‚“ã¨ã€€å°ã˜è¾¼ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã—ãŸã­ï¼

ã€Œç„¡äº‹ã«ã€€ï¼“ã¤ã€€å°å°ã§ããŸã‚‰ ã€€é­”ä»™å¿ã•ã¾ã®æ‰€ã¾ã§ã€€æˆ»ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«â€¦â€¦ ã€€ã¨ã®ã“ã¨ã§ã—ãŸï¼ã€€ãŒã‚“ã°ã£ã¦ãã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼

248151.en:
Hey, you! I heard you rendezvoused
with Mademoiselle Irusha at Demon
World! I'm so jealous!

248152.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! Have you sealed the miasmound? Good for you! I praise you!
Go on to The Oracle!

248153.en:
<pc>! Irusha! I see the
miasmound has been safely sealed! I
knew the two of you would be fine!

248154.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is
Jyadain Garden! The Oracle still wants
to see you! Go back to Goda Temple!
248154.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆãããŸãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼ ã€€ã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã®åœ’ã ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼
ã€Œé­”ä»™å¿ã•ã¾ã¯ã€€ã¾ã ã€€ãŠå‰ã«ç”¨ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãã†ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼ ã€€ã‚´ãƒ€ç¥æ®¿ã«ã€€æˆ»ã‚‹ãŒã„ã„ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼

248155.en:
Something seems to have happened at
Goda Temple. Is everyone all right?

248156.en:
Well, you! You're going on an avant- garde journey with Mademoiselle Irusha! Exploring the ruins is such a
romantic trick! The magical city of Gora is said to be dangerous, so you must protect Irusha as a Knight!
248156.ja:
ã€Œã¾ã‚ã€€ããªãŸï¼ã€€ãƒãƒ‰ãƒ¢ã‚¢ã‚¼ãƒ«ãƒ»ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ã¨ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãªæ—…ã«ã€€å‡ºã‹ã‘ã‚‹ã®ã­ï¼ ã€€å»ƒå¢Ÿã‚’æ¢æ¤œã ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€ãƒ­ãƒãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯ãªã®ã ã‚ï¼
ã€Œé­”å¹»éƒ½å¸‚ã‚´ãƒ¼ãƒ©ã¯ã€€ã‚­ã‚±ãƒ³ã ãã†ã ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ãƒŠã‚¤ãƒˆã¨ã—ã¦ã€€ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ã‚’ã€€å®ˆã‚‹ã®ã‚ˆï¼

248157.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! Are you going to Phantom City Gora? You can get there
from the northwest of Valdia Mountain Region. I'll do my best!

248158.en:
I heard about you! I hear you're heading to Gora, the magical city of Gora, a country that was supposed to
have been destroyed! I hear it's a dangerous place, but I'm sure the two of you will be fine! Please do your
best!
248158.ja:
ã€ŒãŠè©±ã¯èãã¾ã—ãŸï¼ã€€æ»…ã³ãŸã¯ãšã®å›½â€¦â€¦ ã€€é­”å¹»éƒ½å¸‚ã‚´ãƒ¼ãƒ©ã«ã€€å‘ã‹ã‚ã‚Œã‚‹ãã†ã§ã™ã­ï¼
ã€Œã¨ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€€ã‚­ã‚±ãƒ³ãªå ´æ‰€ã ã¨ã€€èã„ã¦ã¾ã™ãŒ ã€€ãŠãµãŸã‚Šãªã‚‰ã€€ãã£ã¨ã€€å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«ã ã¨ä¿¡ã˜ã¦ã¾ã™ï¼ ã€€ã©ã†ã‹ã€€ãŒã‚“ã°ã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã­ï¼

248159.en:
Oh <pc>. I hear you are on
your way to the exile land of Gora.
Take care of yourself! Foffo!

248160.en:
Well, you! How was your avannementure
with Mademoiselle Irusha? I'd love to
hear more about it later!

248161.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! The Oracle doesn't want you here! Don't you have
somewhere else to be? Mon morn!

248162.en:
Oy! <pc>! Welcome back! I'm
glad to hear that you are safe! I was
doing my best to stay at home too!

248163.en:
. I'm glad to hear that you are well. You may go to Jyadain Garden to recover from the fatigue of
your journey! Foffo!

250186.en:
We heard from The Oracle that Irusha has been kidnapped! I heard that Irusha has been kidnapped! Oh, I hope
she is safe. You are going to Farazard to rescue Irusha, right? I'll be cheering for you too,
so please do your best!

250187.en:
Sanguin is always worried about this Irusha girl. It's not uncommon in Demon World for people to get
kidnapped. But, well, I'm starting to worry a little myself. I wish you'd hurry up and save her!

250188.en:
Hey there, from <%sev_personality>! Something terrible has happened to you. You might want to
head to Jyadain Garden to recover from your travels in order to save Irusha! Foffo!

250189.en:
Well, you! How was your avannementure with Mademoiselle Irusha? Oh, dear! Oh, my God! Rescuing a princess from
bondage, of course! Oh, I'm in a storm of excitement!

250190.en:
Welcome to Jyadain Garden! This is Jyadain Garden! The Oracle is waiting for you! Proceed to the audience
chamber of Goda Temple!

250191.en:
Oh ! Irusha came back a while ago and gave me a fuzzy hug! I'm really glad you are safe. I hope I was
of some help to you. I hope I can be of some help to you in the future!

250192.en:
Irusha came back with a big smile on her face. I was so worried about her! I was about to complain, but before I
could complain, she hugged me and smothered me in her arms. I didn't feel anything!

250193.en:
Hey there, from <%sev_personality>! Looks like you saved Irusha in one piece. Well done!
Foffo!

250194.en:
Well, you! I hear you rescued the captive Mademoiselle Irusha. I'm Levia! And? Did the dangerous Avanne
Tulle nurture a fiery amour? That's what I'm most curious about!
250194.ja:
ã€Œã¾ã‚ã€€ããªãŸï¼ã€€ã¨ã‚‰ã‚ã‚Œã®èº«ã® ã€€ãƒãƒ‰ãƒ¢ã‚¢ã‚¼ãƒ«ãƒ»ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ã‚’ ã€€æ•‘ã„ã ã—ãŸãã†ã­ã€‚ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ“ã‚¢ï½ãƒ³ãªã®ã ã‚ï¼
ã€Œãã‚Œã§â€¦â€¦ï¼ï¼Ÿã€€å±é™ºãªã‚¢ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¯ ã€€ç‡ƒãˆã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªã€€ã‚¢ãƒ ï½ãƒ«ã€€ã‚’è‚²ã‚“ã ã®ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã„ã¡ã°ã‚“ã€€æ°—ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€€ãã“ãªã®ã‚ˆï½ï¼
